overview: This short semi-animated film tells the story of a woman's spectacular ocean view from her apartment in Vancouverâ€™s West End. How far will she go when leaves start to obscure her panorama, her light and her happiness? A brilliant blend of stop-motion, projections and models, drawings and altered live-action transports us into a meditation on the tension between urban life and the natural environment. Like Don Giovanni, will our ambitious protagonist stop at nothing to get her way?
title: Big Trees
